pr_title: fix: DHIS2-9065 Misleading password reset message

timeline.message: fix: DHIS2-9065 Misleading password reset message

timeline.bodyText: In the spirit of making it less confusing, I just want to point out that we here talk about uppercase character, number and symbol, but in the other error message, capital letter, digit and special character. Maybe we can stick with one or the other :)
timeline.author: stian-sandvold

replies.bodyText: Thanks, Stian. Point well taken and I have changed this to say capital letter like the Javascript message. Note that both "capital letter" and "uppercase character" are still used in various password validation messages in various places in DHIS2, something that perhaps we can resolve for future versions when we tackle the rest of https://jira.dhis2.org/browse/DHIS2-9065.
replies.author: jimgrace
